ball_force.content: The farther you pull back, the farther the bug will go.

ball_pull_back.content: To move the bug, touch it... pull back... and let go! The bug will roll in the direction of the arrow.

choose_green.content: Choose the one you want to make.

course_ui.content: Tap a button at the bottom to choose the difficulty level.

maker_play_mode.content: To go back into edit mode, tap the EDIT button.

menu_page.content: Here's a map of the island! You can PLAY the bugball course up here. You can MAKE your own bugball holes down here.

setup_screen.content: It's my birthday, and I'm visiting a magical island called Ukubonga, where I can play bugball with my new monster friends!

maker_edit_mode-1.content: Drag obstacles or fruit from the bottom and into the play area. You can put them wherever you want -- as long as there's enough space.

maker_edit_mode-2.content: Then tap them to see all their versions.

maker_edit_mode-3.content: When everything is all set, tap the PLAY button to play!

maker_edit_mode-4.content: To start over, tap THE TRASHCAN.

delete_check.content: Are you sure you want to delete everything?

party_page.content: Cool! You played the whole course! I hope you're enjoying my birthday party! Now you can go back and play all the different levels of each hole, or try making your own!

fdbk_ui.content: To play that hole again (and maybe try a different level) tap the BACK arrow. To play a new hole, tap the FORWARD arrow.
